item.description:
We had such a great time tasting all the wonderful Greek food prepared by the Cavos family and crew that we've decided to take Chef Phillip up on his offer to spit roast a lamb and serve us a full lamb dinner in their outdoor area.

If the weather doesn't cooperate we'll move upstairs to the private dining room.

What a great way to end summer and begin autumn.

Please feel free to invite good friends and family to join us for this one. We are planning on 15 people but can accommodate 30 if there are enough participants.

More on the meal and the location later....if you weren't at the tasting event ask those who were how amazingly good everything is at Cavos.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one that looks like me.
item.name: Cavos - Great Big Greek Dinner
